column3: Concept ACK\n\nVery nice first-time contribution @guggero! Hope to see more contributions from you in the future. Warm welcome! :)

Concept ACK

Are you happy for this to have a "good first review" [label](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19941) @guggero? It would mean the PR is noisier than normal and you might have to answer more basic questions than you otherwise would :)

Thank you all for the (concept) ACKs and the warm welcome :)\n\nI think the label "good first review" is a great idea, @michaelfolkson. I'm happy to answer any and all questions around this PR (that I know the answer to). You're welcome to add the label.

Needs rebase

```
                                   AssertionError: Expected substring not found in error message:

                                   substring: 'both changeAddress and address_type'

                                   error message: 'Cannot specify both change address and address type options'.
Rebased and fixed the error message check.
